channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- Industrial Edge Management Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- Industrial Edge Management Pro

item.title: CVE-2024-45032|2024-09-10T14:07:02.300Z -- siemens -- industrial%20edge%20management%20pro
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Industrial Edge Management Pro (All versions < V1.9.5), Industrial Edge Management Virtual (All versions < V2.3.1-1). Affected components do not properly validate the device tokens. This could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to impersonate other devices onboarded to the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-45032|2024-09-10T09:36:53.535Z -- siemens -- industrial%20edge%20management%20pro
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Industrial Edge Management Pro (All versions < V1.9.5), Industrial Edge Management Virtual (All versions < V2.3.1-1). Affected components do not properly validate the device tokens. This could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to impersonate other devices onboarded to the system.
